description: Assay development is the foundation of in-depth research of a target enzyme, high-throughput screening, and industrial quality monitoring. Furthermore, different types of assays are developed for different applications such as analysis of enzyme activities, small molecule binding to enzyme, enzyme-protein interactions. Creative Enzymes is the leading company in the field of enzymology and well known for offering the best solutions. Our assay development service has been commended by thousands of customers and scientists.
name: Development of Analysis Methods
